Title: The Sontaran Stratagem (1)
Plot:
Location: Modern-day Earth
Date: 2009
Enemies: Sontarans 

Aided by the Rattigan Academy, the Sontarans establish a covert base at the mysterious ATMOS Factory. Can the Doctor stop the Sontarans from unleashing a potent terror that will bring the world to its knees?
GuestStars: Christopher Ryan (General Staal), Eleanor Matsuura (Jo), Wesley Theobald (Private Steve Gray), Christian Cooke (Ross), Ryan Sampson (Luke Rattigan), Dan Starkey (Commander Skorr), Rupert Holliday-Evans (Col
